node.title: Welcome to Sigma homes
node.content:
Sigma Home is a diversified construction venture handling multiple commercial and residential and Infrastructure projects all across Kerala and Karnataka.
Director of Sigma Homes has come a long in making the company from a small construction enterprise to a full fledged property developer in Kerala. He gave up his high profile corporate career to follow his passion of building enriching properties which have carried much elegance and class to all his customers. Over the last 12 years, Sigma has excelled in various commercial and residential projects building itself a very prestigious name among his clients and within the market alike.

From residential towers, multipurpose complexes, to apartment buildings and elegant private villas, Sigma offers solutions across a wide spectrum of businesses. Sigma has delivered many landmark projects over the last decade with many of them standing strong as testaments for the strength and class of construction which Sigma believes in.

By providing world class solutions for all types of customers Sigma’s strengths are its varied experience, rich knowledge of local conditions, high standards of health, safety, quality and environment, its ability to manage operations in diverse industries and markets, long-term relationships with world-class clients and ability to mobilise financial resources.

In its pursuit of business, the company endeavors to uplift the community with better housing and commercial workspaces, thus improving the social conditions in all the areas of interest. Sigma Homes is and will always be committed to the causes of community enrichment.

node.content:
This is an example page. It’s different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I’m a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin’ caught in the rain.)

…or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
